bug.author: texasmichelle
bug.description:
Which version: kfctl v0.5.1 go binary <denchmark-code>$ kfctl version v20181207-4e7f4ed-198-gaeea303e-dirty-03e65e </denchmark-code>
How to reproduce: <denchmark-code>kfctl init kubeflow-cli --platform gcp --project ${PROJECT_ID} cd kubeflow-cli kfctl generate all --zone us-central1-c kfctl apply all </denchmark-code>
What I'm seeing: kfctl exits with this error: <denchmark-code>WARN[0210] Creating kubeflow-cli2 status: RUNNING (op = operation-1561995071209-58ca0515c3ef6-319d1e46-7415e587) filename="gcp/gcp.go:293" ERRO[0393] (Will retry) Component cloud-endpoints apply failed; Error: handle object: patching object from cluster: merging object with existing state: unable to recognize "/var/folders/5w/6jdx5w5925xgswsjjgbtjs9r00h79z/T/ksonnet-mergepatch588044806": no matches for kind "CompositeController" in version "metacontroller.k8s.io/v1alpha1" filename="ksonnet/ksonnet.go:174" </denchmark-code>
Cluster setup appears to continue normally and I can access the central dashboard after DNS propagates. If it's not truly an error, let's find a way to get rid of it.
